|brand = SeeedStudio |model = BeagleBone |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Green Wireless |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = WS2-WG78SBV0 |icid = 10462A-WG78SBV0 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM3358;(AM3358BZCZ100); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAAAM-1MWT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 2C:F7:F1
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2016.03;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.9-ti-r25;Debian 8 (Jessie);
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, Grove, GPIO, |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 LE, |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217C;;1;,,, 2A, 3MHz Step Down Converter;ETA Solutions;ETA3410D21-T;;2;,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G06DCKR;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver with 3-State Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN47LVC2G241DCUR;;1;,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G07DCKR;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;Texas Instruments;TXS0108ERGYR;;2;,,, 32K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32AT-I/OT;;1;,,, Precision Load Switch with Adjustable Current;ETA Solutions;ETA6020D2G-T/U;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.7.2 |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |defaultssid = BeagleBoneXXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^BeagleBone[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/22/2016 |estreldate = 05/2016 |estprice = 45 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01GFSDOTY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Jorjin WG78V0 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;WiLink 8; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specification=== *Processor: ''[[TI]]'' Sitara AM3358BZCZ100 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :CPU Supports: NEON floating-point & 3D graphics accelerator *RAM: ''Micron'' 512MB DDR3L, Flash Storage: ''Micron'' 4GB eMMC *USB Host: 1x Micro USB, Supports powering & communications *Grove Connectors: 2x (One I2C and One UART) *GPIO: 2x 46-pin headers *WiFi: 802.11 b/g/n & Bluetooth 4.1 LE
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.seeed.cc/BeagleBone_Green_Wireless/ ''BeagleBone Green Wireless'' on '''SeeedStudio''' Wiki]
